channel.title: Server help.... i follow the guide and still cant get people on my sever!
channel.description: OMG!, I FOLLOWED ALL THE MODS DIRECTIONS AND STILL CANT GET MY SERVER ONLINE....I MADE IT (BERRY-SCAPE.SERVEBEER.COM) I RUN THE SERVER AND I STILL CANT GET IT TO WORK......AND EVERYTIME I GO TO HAMACHI IT CONTINUES TO SAY "RECONNECTING" NONSTOP. PLZ HELP ME....I REALLY DO NEED HELP :confused:

item.title: Server help.... i follow the guide and still cant get people on my sever!
item.dc:creator: @abedberry abedberry
item.description:
@abedberry wrote:

Ok…srry…when i type in caps thats when im frustrated or mad…

I type in my ip in the server status page and it says its offline…how do i turn it on…oh and when i log in on berry-scape.servebeer.com is says error connecting to server and when i go to no-ip.com my server is right there…

Read full topic
item.source: Server help.... i follow the guide and still cant get people on my sever!

item.title: Server help.... i follow the guide and still cant get people on my sever!
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Ok DONT YOU HATE IT WHEN PEOPLE TYPE IN CAPS ALL THE TIME AND YOU CANT READ CRAP ABOUT WHAT THEY SAID.

Anyways If thats no-ip you don’t need hamachi. Just tell them the berry-scape.servebeer.com and type that in the Ip. section, Also make sure your port is right.

Dont keep posting for help because obliviously no one knows.

Read full topic
